attributes.action: pursue the profiteers in the finance sector for the return of their ill gotten gains.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It isn't enough just to sack a few top executives, the lower level minions should be forced to pay back any cash bonuses 'earned' on the basis of what was effectively fraud. Bonuses in the form of share options could similarly be returned. The Proceeds of Crime Act would be an appropriate mechanism. And if a few people end up in prison, that would be no more than appropriate.
